definitions.definition: To transfer data from a remote computer (server) to a local computer, usually via a network.
definitions.example: You can download a trial version of the program for thirty days to determine whether you want to purchase the full version.

definitions.definition: To upload; to copy a file from a local computer to a remote computer via a network.
To transfer a file to or from removable media.
definitions.example: I needed to download photos to a CD-ROM
